ownPages.title: ExceptionType
ownPages.content: Used for throwing exceptions with a type that makes more sense to the developer based on the cause

ownPages.title: SecureStorageException
ownPages.content: Useful for catching possible exceptions thrown internally in the library so the user knows what to expect Useful for catching possible exceptions thrown internally in the library so the user knows what to expect

ownPages.title: SecureStorage
ownPages.content: init Initialize the library with desired options initSecureStorageKeys Initialize SecureStorage keys for library usage. deviceHasSecureHardwareSupport Checks if the device has secure hardware support (TEE or SE) for storing the Android Keystore keys isKeyInsideSecureHardware Checks if the keys are stored in secure hardware (TEE or SE) putString Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device putBoolean Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device putFloat Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device putLong Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device putInt Takes plain string value, encrypts it and stores it encrypted in the SecureStorage on the Android Device getString Gets encrypted String value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it getBoolean Gets encrypted boolean value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it getFloat Gets encrypted float value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it getLong Gets encrypted long value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it getInt Gets encrypted int value for given key from the SecureStorage on the Android Device, decrypts it and returns it contains Checks if SecureStorage contains a value for the given key (Does not return the value or check what type it is) remove Removes the value for a given key from SecureStorage clearAllValues Clears all values from the SecureStorage on the Android Device clearAllValuesAndDeleteKeys Clears all values from the SecureStorage on the Android Device and deletes the en/decryption keys Means new keys/keypairs have to be generated for the library to be able to work registerOnSecureStorageChangeListener Registers SecureStorageChangeListener to listen to any changes in SecureStorage unregisterOnSecureStorageChangeListener Unregisters SecureStorageChangeListener from SecureStorage
